name: video-playlist-downloader

scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build:exe: npm run build && pkg dist/main.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output video-downloader.exe
scripts.build:exe-all: npm run build && pkg dist/main.js --targets node18-win-x64,node18-macos-x64,node18-linux-x64 --output video-downloader

author: AbdallahKhaledAhmed
description: A powerful TypeScript-based video downloader with interactive CLI interface
